## NodeCanvas.getContext() method

Get a 2D rendering context for the canvas.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getContext(context: "2d", options?: IRenderingContextOptions): NodeCanvasRenderingContext2D;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  context | <code>&quot;2d&quot;</code> | The context to request. |
|  options | <code>IRenderingContextOptions</code> | Optional options for the context. |

<b>Returns:</b>

`NodeCanvasRenderingContext2D`
